text: Daniel Osvaldo Scioli (, ; born 13 January 1957) is an Argentine politician and businessman. He was Vice President of Argentina from 2003 to 2007 and Governor of Buenos Aires Province from 2011 to 2015. From 2020 to 2022 he was Argentina's ambassador to Brazil. In 2022, he became the Minister of Production in the cabinet of Alberto Fern√°ndez. He was president of the Justicialist Party. He ran for President of Argentina in the 2015 general elections, and lost to Mauricio Macri in a runoff election. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Businesspeople from Buenos Aires Category:Ambassadors Category:Argentine diplomats
title: Daniel Scioli
